Partners

BEN partners with blockchain companies and conferences to distribute opportunities to students. Email contact@blockchainedu.org for more information

Educational Partnership

Companies may host an activity in our curriculum to encourage our students to explore blockchain, like launching smart contracts, running nodes, messing around with tokens, and more. BEN tracks students' progress and completions with the issuance of certificates of completion. BEN can deliver valuable metrics, feedback, and insights from students. Upon the completion of these activities, students can earn

Event Partnership

For 2019, BEN will be partnering with and co-hosting several blockchain conferences and hackathons to bring our students to. BEN will share your event with our students and get a higher student presence for your event.
